A4.text: On the west, Spain is bordered by Portugal;

A5.text: on the south, it is bordered by Gibraltar and Morocco, through its exclaves in North Africa (Ceuta and Melilla, and the peninsula of de VÃ©lez de la Gomera).

A6.text: Portugal shares a land border with Spain along its northern and eastern edges, connecting the Iberian Peninsula.
